translation.en: ♪ You don't owe me ♪ ♪ One more minute of your wasted time ♪
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创剧集

translation.en: ♪ I'm already gone ♪
translation.zh: 剧名：倾泻而出

translation.en: [woman] Shall we begin?
translation.zh: 我们开始吧？

translation.en: My client recognizes the deep attachment that your client has to his Mercedes
translation.zh: 我的委托人认可 你的委托人对其梅赛德斯的眷恋

translation.en: and will not contest it.
translation.zh: 不会提出反对

translation.en: [man] Mighty gracious.
translation.zh: 真是太好了

translation.en: -She will retain the Buick Enclave. -We don't have a problem with that.
translation.zh: 她会留下那辆别克昂科雷 -这一点我们没意见 -很好

translation.en: -Excellent. -[man chuckles]
translation.zh: -这一点我们没意见 -很好

translation.en: [woman] Now moving on to the disposition of the family home--
translation.zh: 现在继续谈谈家庭房屋的处置

translation.en: [man] My client requests the family home be sold
translation.zh: 我的委托人要求出售家庭房屋

translation.en: and the proceeds divided equitably between parties.
translation.zh: 所得收益在各方之间均分

translation.en: While you're busy hangin' price tags, Bill Townsend,
translation.zh: 你在忙着 给东西打上价码的同时 比尔·汤森

translation.en: keep in mind that you aren't worth the skin God spent to wrap your bones in.
translation.zh: 要记住 你简直一文不值 即便在上帝眼中也如此

translation.en: You best pray he doesn't regret his investment in you
translation.zh: 你最好祈祷上帝别像我一样

translation.en: as much as I regret mine.
translation.zh: 后悔对你的付出

translation.en: Helen?
translation.zh: 海伦？

translation.en: Maddie?
translation.zh: 麦迪？

translation.en: -Helen, I'm sorry. -Oh, don't you dare apologize.
translation.zh: -海伦 抱歉… -你千万别道歉

translation.en: That was the most magnificent thing I've seen you do
translation.zh: 自从你在幼儿园吃掉蜥蜴以来

translation.en: since you ate that lizard in kindergarten.
translation.zh: 那是你做过的最了不得的事了

translation.en: I only bit its tail.
translation.zh: 我只是咬掉了蜥蜴尾巴

translation.en: Maddie, this is hard.
translation.zh: 麦迪 这事不容易

translation.en: -But you will persevere. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但你会熬过去的 -嗯

translation.en: What, so Bill gets to buy mistress Noreen a new house?
translation.zh: 所以比尔能给情妇诺琳买套新房子？

translation.en: The kids and I just have to move and start over?
translation.zh: 而我和孩子们非得搬走重新开始？

translation.en: -No, you won't have to do that. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 不 你们不必那样做

translation.en: Helen, I swear sometimes I think it would be a blessing
translation.zh: 海伦 我发誓 有时候我觉得

translation.en: to live in a place that... nobody knew what happened.
translation.zh: 要是住在一个 没人知道这事的地方就好了

translation.en: But the kids would have to find a new school...
translation.zh: 但那样的话 孩子们得找新学校

translation.en: new friends and I'd be without you and Dana Sue and I just...
translation.zh: 结交新朋友 而我会失去你和达娜·苏 我就…

translation.en: How in the devil did I get to this place?
translation.zh: 我到底是怎么沦落至此的？

translation.en: Maddie, I got you.
translation.zh: 麦迪 我挺你…

translation.en: But Tom came on strong because that's his job.
translation.zh: 但汤姆来势汹汹 因为那是他的工作

translation.en: I am gonna beat him down because that's my job.
translation.zh: 我一定会打倒他 因为那是我的工作

translation.en: I'm gonna get you everything you deserve and then some.
translation.zh: 我会让你拿到你所应得的东西 而且还有更多

translation.en: I'm still researching the legal precedent
translation.zh: 我还在研究法律上的先例

translation.en: for getting Bill's head on a silver platter.
translation.zh: 以便把比尔的脑袋放砧板上 任我们宰割

translation.en: It wasn't his head that caused the problem.
translation.zh: 引出问题的可不是他的脑袋

translation.en: That's my girl.
translation.zh: 这才像话

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, Lord.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[boy 1] So I got cast as Puck. -[boy 2] Oh, congrats.
translation.zh: -我拿下了帕克这个角色 -恭喜

translation.en: -[girl] Maybe I should ask for autographs. -[boy 2 laughs]
translation.zh: 也许我该叫你签名了

translation.en: -Well, he needs help spelling his name. -[girl laughs]
translation.zh: 他可不会拼写自己的名字

translation.en: -Oops, you forgot you aren't funny. -Ah!
translation.zh: 你忘了自己并不搞笑

translation.en: Seriously. First a baseball star and now a theater star.
translation.zh: 说真的 之前有了棒球明星 现在又有了剧院明星

translation.en: Am I even worthy to walk to school with the two of you?
translation.zh: 我还配得上跟你们俩一起上学吗？

translation.en: I'm just playing Puck. It's not even the lead.
translation.zh: 我只是扮演帕克 连主角都不是

translation.en: But it's the best part, and you're only a freshman.
translation.zh: 但那是最好的部分 而且你还只是高一新生

translation.en: Yeah, A Midsummer Night's Nerd!
translation.zh: 是啊 “仲夏夜之书呆子”

translation.en: Can't all be jerks. I mean jocks.
translation.zh: 总不能全是贱人啊 我是说 健将

translation.en: Oh, you think you're funny? Yeah? -Hey! Hey! -There ya go!
translation.zh: 觉得自己很搞笑是吧？来啊

translation.en: [boy 2] I can get you and your mom house seats.
translation.zh: 我能给你和你妈拿到赠票

translation.en: [girl] I don't know if my mom can come.
translation.zh: 我不知道我妈是否能来

translation.en: -[boys] The restaurant. -[girl] The restaurant.
translation.zh: -因为餐厅 -因为餐厅

translation.en: [boy 2] Don't worry. You can sit with us.
translation.zh: 别担心 你可以坐我们旁边

translation.en: [boy 1] So what does Puck even do?
translation.zh: 帕克到底是做什么的？

translation.en: He solves everything. -[boy 1] Oh. -[girl] Okay.
translation.zh: -他解决一切问题 -好吧

translation.en: -Just like you, right? -[girl laughs]
translation.zh: -就跟你一样 对吧？ -没错

translation.en: -Exactly. -All right, I'll catch y'all.
translation.zh: -就跟你一样 对吧？ -没错 好了 晚点见

translation.en: So, Annie, you had Mrs. Kelsey last year, right?
translation.zh: 安妮 去年是凯尔西老师 给你上这门课吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Any tips on conquering The Odyssey?
translation.zh: -是的 -征服《奥德赛》有什么窍门吗？

translation.en: Actually read it. She'll know if you're faking.
translation.zh: 要真的去读 作假的话 她一定会知道

translation.en: -Okay. -I'll see you later.
translation.zh: -好的 -待会见

translation.en: Ah! You're early! Okay, you know what?
translation.zh: 你们来早了 好吧 知道吗？

translation.en: That is fine because I am ready to go.
translation.zh: 这没关系 因为我已经准备好了

translation.en: All right, new cocktail.
translation.zh: 好了 新的鸡尾酒

translation.en: I started with rye to wish you a smooth finish,
translation.zh: 我以黑麦威士忌起手 希望余味能够平滑

translation.en: added some bitters 'cause you have every right to be.
translation.zh: 加了些苦酒 因为你完全有权觉得苦涩愤恨

translation.en: Then champagne because this is truly a celebration
translation.zh: 然后加了香槟 因为这真的是一份庆祝

translation.en: and finished with crème de pêche.
translation.zh: 最后加了奶油甜桃酒

translation.en: Because your future is gonna be peachy.
translation.zh: 因为你的未来会跟蜜桃一样甜

translation.en: Calling it Maddie's Moment.
translation.zh: 这款酒叫做麦迪高光时刻

translation.en: There is nothing to celebrate.
translation.zh: 没什么好庆祝的

translation.en: Wait, what're you two up to?
translation.zh: 等等 你俩有什么密谋？

translation.en: Darlin', we are all about being here with you, for you.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我们一心想陪着你、支持你

translation.en: No, no, no. No. There's something else. I can smell it.
translation.zh: 不 不只是这样 我能嗅出不对劲

translation.en: And you two should know better than anyone that I have lost my tolerance
translation.zh: 你俩应该比谁都清楚 我已经无法容忍

translation.en: -for people keeping secrets from me. -Okay, you know what?
translation.zh: -有人对我隐瞒秘密 -好吧 这样吧

translation.en: Let's forget celebrating, all right?
translation.zh: 忘掉庆祝的事 好吧？

translation.en: Let's think of these more as a statement of intent. Okay?
translation.zh: 我们就把这当做是意向宣言 好吧？

translation.en: Helen?
translation.zh: 海伦？

translation.en: Press on. Okay?
translation.zh: 勇往直前 好吧？

translation.en: Maddie, nobody's gonna make you drink, but at least sit down.
translation.zh: 麦迪 没人逼你喝酒 但至少坐下来吧

translation.en: -Come on. Take a moment or two-- -No, no, no. I cannot.
translation.zh: -来 稍歇片刻… -不行 我做不到

translation.en: I cannot because if I relax, I'm gonna lose it.
translation.zh: 我做不到 因为如果放松下来 我会控制不了自己

translation.en: I swear to God, some days I just...
translation.zh: 我对天发誓 有些日子 我醒来时

translation.en: I wake up, and I have nothing but hate
translation.zh: 我对天发誓 有些日子 我醒来时 血管里流动着的

translation.en: for Bill and Noreen pumping through my veins.
translation.zh: 只有对比尔和诺琳的憎恨

translation.en: I have to get a new job.
translation.zh: 我得去找份新工作

translation.en: I have to get a new house.
translation.zh: 我得去找套新房子

translation.en: I have to get a new everything, and I...
translation.zh: 我一切都得去找新的 我…

translation.en: I feel like I can't even catch my breath.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己甚至喘不过气来

translation.en: -Precisely why you need new inspiration. -Dana Sue,
translation.zh: -正因为如此 你才需要新的灵感 -达娜·苏

translation.en: -now's not the time. It's not the time. -Why isn't--
translation.zh: -现在不是好时候 -为什么…

translation.en: -Tell me. Tell me right this minute. -Tell her.
translation.zh: -告诉我 现在就告诉我 -告诉她

translation.en: Maddie...
translation.zh: 麦迪

translation.en: you know how Ms. Frances for a while now has been talking about downsizing?
translation.zh: 你知道弗朗西丝女士一直在说 要搬到小一点的房子吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Well, I thought it was a lovely idea,
translation.zh: -嗯 -我觉得那个主意很好

translation.en: but it also broke my heart a little
translation.zh: 但也让我有点伤心的是

translation.en: to think of that house just sitting there all empty.
translation.zh: 那栋房子就那样空荡荡地杵在那里

translation.en: So, I, uh...
translation.zh: 所以我…

translation.en: I bought that big, beautiful house of hers.
translation.zh: 我买下了她那栋漂亮的大房子

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[stammers] You...
translation.zh: 你…

translation.en: Did you-- Did you ask her family?
translation.zh: 你问过她家人了吗？

translation.en: I do not give a flying fish
translation.zh: 我一点都不在乎

translation.en: what Ryan Wingate thinks about anything.
translation.zh: 莱恩·温格特会有什么想法

translation.en: -Let me tell you why-- -[clears throat] All right. All right.
translation.zh: -我告诉你为什么… -行了

translation.en: Get ready for the best part.
translation.zh: 准备好听最棒的部分

translation.en: We three are gonna turn that big, old house
translation.zh: 我们仨将会把那个大大的老宅

translation.en: into a fluffy, glorious, indulgent spa.
translation.zh: 变成温馨、耀眼和惬意的水疗会所

translation.en: Helen'll handle legal,
translation.zh: 海伦负责法务

translation.en: I'll set up the cafe, and you'll be the manager.
translation.zh: 我来布置咖啡厅 你来做经理

translation.en: How on God's green earth
translation.zh: 你们到底是为什么

translation.en: did you two think for one second
translation.zh: 会觉得我能够

translation.en: that I would be able to start something new,
translation.zh: 在如此混乱的形势下

translation.en: something this huge, in the midst of all of this chaos?
translation.zh: 开始新的事物、这么大型的事物？

translation.en: -[Helen] Maddie, it's a job. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 麦迪 这是一份工作

translation.en: Thank you so much for understanding, friends.
translation.zh: 真是谢谢你们理解我 好闺蜜

translation.en: This morning was a little tougher than she was prepared for.
translation.zh: 今早比较不顺 让她有点措手不及

translation.en: She just needs a chance to regain her bearings, that's all.
translation.zh: 她只是需要一个机会来弄清方向而已

translation.en: Well, I can empathize.
translation.zh: 好吧 我能理解她的心情

translation.en: I thought I would lose my mind after I threw Ronnie out.
translation.zh: 当年把罗尼赶出去后 我觉得自己会发疯

translation.en: But I at least let you two help me.
translation.zh: 但至少我愿意让你俩帮助我

translation.en: Is that how you remember it?
translation.zh: 你记忆里是那样？

translation.en: Clear as day.
translation.zh: 记得清清楚楚

translation.en: Well, you go on and cling to that then, Dana Sue.
translation.zh: 好吧 你就继续这样想吧 达娜·苏

translation.en: And let me try to figure out a way to talk Maddie down. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我去试着想办法说服麦迪

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. All right, you think you can?
translation.zh: 好吧 你觉得自己能做到？

translation.en: I am gonna sweep Maddie up so fast,
translation.zh: 我会迅雷不及掩耳地打动麦迪

translation.en: you better have a bottle of your finest whiskey standing by
translation.zh: 你最好拿出你最好的威士忌等着

translation.en: to mark the occasion, no offense to this lovely cocktail.
translation.zh: 来纪念这一刻 当然 你这份鸡尾酒也很棒

translation.en: Is that Macallan 18 confidence I'm hearing?
translation.zh: 你这是麦卡伦18年陈酿级别的自信？

translation.en: That, my dear, is Macallan 25.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 是麦卡伦25年陈酿级别

translation.en: Ooh, bless your heart.
translation.zh: 衷心祝福你

translation.en: All right, go forth then and work your magic.
translation.zh: 好了 去大展身手吧

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 狗娘养的

translation.en: Randy, we'll put you and your mom in the circus room
translation.zh: 兰迪 你和你妈妈待在检查室

translation.en: and Dr. Bill will be right in.
translation.zh: 比尔医生很快会进来

translation.en: -What was that about? -Come on, Bill.
translation.zh: -那是怎么回事？ -拜托 比尔

translation.en: You gotta know there are a lot of people unhappy with your... situation.
translation.zh: 你肯定知道许多人不满你的…情况

translation.en: Well, my personal situation is none of their business.
translation.zh: 好吧 我的私人情况不关他们的事

translation.en: Well, it's half my business.
translation.zh: 好吧 有一半关我的事

translation.en: People are canceling their appointments to steer clear of you and Noreen.
translation.zh: 大家都在取消预约 避开你和诺琳

translation.en: -And that's hurting our practice. -We're getting married.
translation.zh: -这对我们的业务不利 -我们要结婚了

translation.en: Come on. Maddie and I were on the rocks, Howie.
translation.zh: 拜托 麦迪和我本来就不顺 小霍

translation.en: I'm doing right by Noreen.
translation.zh: 我这是不辜负诺琳

translation.en: That oughta mean something.
translation.zh: 这样做应该有所意义吧

translation.en: It means something, Bill. Just not sure what.
translation.zh: 有所意义 比尔 只是不确定是什么意义

translation.en: Aren't you ready to pack it in yet, man? I mean, you're older than I am.
translation.zh: 你还没准备好退休吗 哥们？ 你比我年纪还大

translation.en: I love what I do, Collins. I'm sorry you don't.
translation.zh: 我爱我的工作 柯林斯 很遗憾你不爱你的工作

translation.en: [sighs] We will never get another offer this good!
translation.zh: 我们不可能再拿到这么好的报价！

translation.en: Collins, if you want to sell your store, then sell it,
translation.zh: 柯林斯 你想卖你的店 那就卖吧

translation.en: but Grace and I aren't ready to sell.
translation.zh: 但我和格蕾丝还不想卖

translation.en: Pickle Jar wants the whole block.
translation.zh: 泡菜坛餐厅想要一整条街

translation.en: You don't sell, and you ruin it for all of us.
translation.zh: 你们不卖就是祸害大家

translation.en: Neville, Collins.
translation.zh: 纳威 柯林斯

translation.en: You two enjoying your meals this afternoon?
translation.zh: 二位今天下午吃得开心吗？

translation.en: Oh, my meal was delightful as always, Dana Sue.
translation.zh: 饭菜一如既往地令人开怀 达娜·苏

translation.en: Well, good.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Wish I could say the same for my pig-headed companion.
translation.zh: 要是我这跟牛一样犟的同伴 也让人开怀就好了

translation.en: Since I have upset you so, Collins,
translation.zh: 既然我惹你这么生气 柯林斯

translation.en: the least I can do is pay.
translation.zh: 至少让我来买单吧

translation.en: Damn straight. Damn straight.
translation.zh: 可不是嘛

translation.en: You two all right?
translation.zh: 你俩没事吧？

translation.en: It's hard when business comes between friends.
translation.zh: 朋友之间涉及生意 不容易啊

translation.en: [man] Mrs. Townsend.
translation.zh: 汤森夫人

translation.en: Coach Maddox.
translation.zh: 马多克斯教练

translation.en: Do you have a moment?
translation.zh: 能谈谈吗？

translation.en: Is there a problem?
translation.zh: 有什么问题吗？

translation.en: I believe in Ty.
translation.zh: 我相信阿泰的实力

translation.en: He's got an amazing arm and a great heart.
translation.zh: 他的臂力很强 人也很好

translation.en: Oh, dear. That big a problem?
translation.zh: 天啊 看来问题很严重

translation.en: Ty and Jackson Lewis were at each other during practice.
translation.zh: 阿泰和杰克森·路易斯 在练习时打架了

translation.en: I made 'em both run laps, and Ty will be along... momentarily.
translation.zh: 我罚他们跑圈 阿泰很快会出来

translation.en: Merciful heaven, why is it always Jackson?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 为什么总是杰克森？

translation.en: Those two have been grappling since the sandbox.
translation.zh: 他们俩从小就开始互掐了

translation.en: I thought I got a whiff of a longstanding rivalry.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己嗅到了宿怨的气息

translation.en: Yeah, well, still, that is no excuse
translation.zh: 嗯 不过那也不是

translation.en: for Ty having a part in disrupting your practice.
translation.zh: 阿泰打扰练习的借口

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I-- I keep telling him that it's an honor to be coached by a professional player.
translation.zh: 我一直跟他说 有职业球手做教练是他的荣幸

translation.en: [chuckles] Former professional player.
translation.zh: 前任职业球手

translation.en: Well, still.
translation.zh: 那也是职业球手

translation.en: Well, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Uh, but I do wanna say that Ty has been a little... hair-trigger lately...
translation.zh: 但我想说阿泰最近有点暴脾气

translation.en: and I don't mean to overstep, but are there any issues
translation.zh: 我不想越界 不过有没有什么问题

translation.en: I should know about?
translation.zh: 是我应该知道的？

translation.en: Yeah, he's... he's hit a bit of a rough patch.
translation.zh: 对 他最近有点不如意

translation.en: Ah. Junior year's a beast.
translation.zh: 高三时光压力很大

translation.en: It certainly is. And he's hard on himself, and...
translation.zh: 确实是的 而且他对自己很严苛…

translation.en: I'm going to take him home now.
translation.zh: 我现在带他回家

translation.en: -As you should. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -理应如此 -谢谢

translation.en: Anytime.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: [Dana Sue] Explain this, please.
translation.zh: 请解释一下

translation.en: Simon Spry wrote that, not me.
translation.zh: 那是西蒙·斯普莱写的 不是我

translation.en: I am talking about the picture,
translation.zh: 我说的是那张照片

translation.en: which was taken from the roof of this restaurant
translation.zh: 那是大半夜的时候

translation.en: in the middle of the night
translation.zh: 从这家餐厅的屋顶上拍的

translation.en: by a girl who could only have gotten up there
translation.zh: 拍照片的姑娘能上屋顶

translation.en: if she took my keys without my permission.
translation.zh: 只可能是因为偷偷拿了我的钥匙

translation.en: -I don't know. -Remember how I feel about lying?
translation.zh: -我不知道 -记得我对撒谎作何感受吗？

translation.en: Okay, I took a risk, but art requires risk.
translation.zh: 好吧 我冒了险 但艺术需要冒险

translation.en: I'm just as committed to my art as you are to yours.
translation.zh: 我对我艺术的投入 不亚于你对你艺术的投入

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: And by "art,"
translation.zh: 你说的“艺术”

translation.en: you mean this Instagram account called Welcome to Serenity?
translation.zh: 是指这个名为“欢迎来到宁静镇”的 照片墙帐号？

translation.en: Okay, your friend Simon says, "It presents a look at the real Serenity."
translation.zh: 好 你朋友西蒙说 它呈现了真实的宁静镇

translation.en: So I thought I would take a look at my daughter's opinion of her hometown.
translation.zh: 所以我想看看 我女儿是怎样看待自己故乡的

translation.en: And this Instagram account
translation.zh: 而这个照片墙帐号

translation.en: is filled with pictures of possums
translation.zh: 照片里全是负鼠

translation.en: and broken windows and sick trees.
translation.zh: 破烂窗户和病恹恹的树

translation.en: Is that truly how you see us?
translation.zh: 你眼里的我们真是这样？

translation.en: Everyone in this town pretends to be so perfect,
translation.zh: 镇上每个人都假装完美

translation.en: always sweet, smiling, serene,
translation.zh: 总是甜美、微笑、宁静

translation.en: and then when your life blows up,
translation.zh: 当你的生活翻天覆地时

translation.en: you're supposed to just pretend like everything's still all good?
translation.zh: 也要假装岁月静好吗？

translation.en: All fine, all bright and shiny and--
translation.zh: 一切都好、一切清新亮丽…

translation.en: Okay, so because of what happened with your dad,
translation.zh: 好 所以因为你爸的事

translation.en: you are gonna mock this whole town,
translation.zh: 你就要嘲笑整个镇子

translation.en: which is filled with good people
translation.zh: 而镇上其实全是好人

translation.en: just doing their best to get through the day.
translation.zh: 尽他们最大努力度过每一天

translation.en: This isn't about Dad.
translation.zh: 这跟爸爸无关

translation.en: You know, why are we even having this conversation?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要进行这场对话？

translation.en: You don't get me. Or my art.
translation.zh: 你不懂我 也不懂我的艺术

translation.en: I have something to say.
translation.zh: 我有话要说

translation.en: Well, you find another way to say it.
translation.zh: 行 你找其他方式去说

translation.en: And don't you ever take my keys again.
translation.zh: 还有不准再拿我的钥匙

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Chef, thank you for joining us.
translation.zh: 主厨 谢谢你加入我们

translation.en: What do you need, Brad?
translation.zh: 你想干什么 布拉德？

translation.en: Let us discuss the dissolute life this catfish led.
translation.zh: 我们来谈谈这条鲶鱼的放荡一生

translation.en: Overlook his sins and fry him.
translation.zh: 忽略它的罪过 把它炸了

translation.en: Folks are coming to eat him, not befriend him.
translation.zh: 大家来这里是为了吃它 不是跟它交心

translation.en: I wanted to poach him.
translation.zh: 我想做成水煮

translation.en: Well, we all want things we can't have. All right, listen up, y'all.
translation.zh: 人生哪能事事如愿 好了 大家听好

translation.en: We have a problem.
translation.zh: 我们有个问题

translation.en: Several bottles of very expensive liquor are missing.
translation.zh: 有几瓶非常昂贵的酒不见了

translation.en: [Brad] Disappointing.
translation.zh: 真是令人失望

translation.en: These things don't happen in a well-run kitchen, people.
translation.zh: 一个管理有方的厨房 不能发生这种事 各位

translation.en: How are we gonna handle this?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么处理这事？

translation.en: If the bottles are returned by end of day tomorrow,
translation.zh: 如果明天结束前把那些酒还回来

translation.en: I absolve you. If they aren't, there will be hell to pay. That simple.
translation.zh: 那我就不追究了 否则后果很重要 就这么简单

translation.en: Any questions?
translation.zh: 有问题吗？

translation.en: -[employees] No, chef. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -没有 主厨 -谢谢

translation.en: Back to work, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家继续干活

translation.en: Erik's right. Let's get ready to make some hungry people happy.
translation.zh: 埃里克说得对 大家准备好让饿肚子的人吃个开心

translation.en: Hey, can you go upstairs and make sure Katie brushed her teeth?
translation.zh: 你能上楼去确保凯蒂刷牙了吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Thanks for dinner, Mom.
translation.zh: 谢谢你做晚餐 妈

translation.en: Yeah, I'm glad you liked it. You were pretty quiet.
translation.zh: 嗯 很高兴你喜欢 你安静得很

translation.en: Can't get a word in once Katie gets going on Trollhunters.
translation.zh: 凯蒂一开口谈《巨怪猎人》 大家就没法插嘴

translation.en: I thought it was because you didn't want to tell me the details of your practice.
translation.zh: 我还以为 是因为你不想谈练习时的具体情况

translation.en: Told you on the way home. Practice was fine.
translation.zh: 回家路上跟你说过了 练习很好

translation.en: -Tyler. -Mother.
translation.zh: -泰勒 -妈

translation.en: Coach Maddox told me there was a problem.
translation.zh: 马多克斯教练跟我说出了点问题

translation.en: That's great.
translation.zh: 真是太好了

translation.en: Thought maybe you'd wanna fess up.
translation.zh: 我以为你可能想坦白

translation.en: Tell me the details.
translation.zh: 把具体情况告诉我

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay. Okay, Jacks is a jerk.
translation.zh: 好 杰克森是个混球

translation.en: Coach is a hardass, and I ran laps. Is that enough detail?
translation.zh: 教练很死板 我跑圈了 这样够具体了吗？

translation.en: -Watch your tone. -Can I watch it in my room?
translation.zh: 语气注意点 -我能回房里注意吗？ -泰勒

translation.en: Tyler, I've had myself a day,
translation.zh: -我能回房里注意吗？ -泰勒 我今天已经够心累了

translation.en: and the last thing I need is disrespect from you to ice the cake.
translation.zh: 我最不需要的就是你对我不敬 让事情雪上加霜

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -Go upstairs before you say something that I will make you regret.
translation.zh: 快点上楼 免得你说出我一定会让你后悔的话

translation.en: God, I-- I thought you'd gone!
translation.zh: 天啊 我以为你已经走了

translation.en: Inspiration struck.
translation.zh: 突然来了灵感

translation.en: I want to experiment.
translation.zh: 我想试验一下

translation.en: Uh, not at this hour.
translation.zh: 这个点可不行

translation.en: This is when I do my best cooking.
translation.zh: 这个点 我烹饪最佳

translation.en: Well, that's supposed to be when you're on the clock.
translation.zh: 应该要上班期间烹饪最佳才对

translation.en: -[Dana Sue chuckles] -Eh, you know,
translation.zh: 你知道的

translation.en: you squelch my creativity because you're jealous.
translation.zh: 你嫉妒我 所以想打压我的创意

translation.en: Have you been drinking?
translation.zh: 你是不是喝酒了？

translation.en: I'm not on your stupid clock.
translation.zh: 现在可不是傻冒的上班时间

translation.en: You're in my kitchen.
translation.zh: 你在我的厨房里

translation.en: And there's no drinking in my kitchen. Ever.
translation.zh: 我厨房里禁酒 永远都是

translation.en: What...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: -Oh, you like my cologne? -Oh my God, that's whiskey!
translation.zh: -你喜欢我的古龙水？ -天啊 那是威士忌

translation.en: That is old, expensive whiskey!
translation.zh: 那是昂贵的陈年威士忌

translation.en: You thief!
translation.zh: 你个小偷！

translation.en: You know, everything that you have
translation.zh: 你拥有的一切

translation.en: is because of me.
translation.zh: 都是拜我所赐

translation.en: Everything I have, I worked for.
translation.zh: 我拥有的一切都是我努力的结果

translation.en: And sacrificed for
translation.zh: 和我所做牺牲的回报

translation.en: without talking down to my staff
translation.zh: 我不会趾高气昂教训员工

translation.en: or pretending that my talent excuses bad behavior.
translation.zh: 也不会假装我的天分能包庇恶劣行为

translation.en: You know the reason female chefs rarely succeed?
translation.zh: 你知道女主厨为什么很少成功吗？

translation.en: You can't take criticism.
translation.zh: 你们没法接受批评

translation.en: Goodbye, Brad.
translation.zh: 再见 布拉德

translation.en: [chortles] Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Ah, don't be a buzzkill.
translation.zh: 别这么扫兴

translation.en: We got this beautiful piece of meat to play with.
translation.zh: 这里有一块上好的肉 我们可以玩玩

translation.en: -We got all night. -You're fired.
translation.zh: -我们有整晚时间 -你被炒了

translation.en: [chortles] No, I'm not.
translation.zh: 才不是

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I don't think I could use any smaller words.
translation.zh: 我想不出更加云淡风轻的说法了

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: 走人

translation.en: -No, come on. -Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -别这样 -别碰我

translation.en: Get out.
translation.zh: 滚出去

translation.en: Get out.
translation.zh: 滚出去

translation.en: Get your things and get out of here!
translation.zh: 收拾东西 滚出这里

translation.en: And leave your key.
translation.zh: 把钥匙留下

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy's here!
translation.zh: 爸爸 爸爸来了

translation.en: [woman] Hi, Katie.
translation.zh: 嗨 凯蒂

translation.en: [Katie] No, you're not Daddy.
translation.zh: 不 你不是爸爸

translation.en: -Noreen. -Bill got called into the office.
translation.zh: -诺琳 -比尔被叫到办公室了

translation.en: There's this nasty bug going around,
translation.zh: 有种很严重的病毒在传播

translation.en: and we just got flooded with emergency walk-ins.
translation.zh: 有一大群人跑来急诊

translation.en: So I'm here to pick them up.
translation.zh: 所以由我过来接他们

translation.en: Okay, I'm not going.
translation.zh: 好了 我不去

translation.en: Oh, no, your dad doesn't have to work the whole day.
translation.zh: 不 你爸不用工作一整天

translation.en: He's just running late, and he didn't want y'all to have to wait.
translation.zh: 他只是赶不上时间 不想让你们干等着

translation.en: It's your dad's day.
translation.zh: 今天是你爸探视的日子

translation.en: Yeah, well, I don't have the bug so I don't need to see him.
translation.zh: 好吧 我没得病 不需要见他

translation.en: I'm staying with Ty.
translation.zh: 我和阿泰一起留下

translation.en: I'm not gonna force my children to go with you.
translation.zh: 我不会逼我孩子跟你走

translation.en: Bill will be so disappointed.
translation.zh: 比尔会很失望的

translation.en: Yeah, well, Bill should be here.
translation.zh: 好吧 那么比尔应该亲自过来

translation.en: I'll go.
translation.zh: 我去

translation.en: So, how's school?
translation.zh: 学校怎么样？

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 很不错

translation.en: I'm in the spring play. I'm Puck in Midsummer Night's Dream.
translation.zh: 我参演了春季戏剧 扮演《仲夏夜之梦》里的帕克

translation.en: I don't know that one.
translation.zh: 我不知道那部剧

translation.en: Shakespeare?
translation.zh: 莎士比亚？

translation.en: I've only seen one play. It was beautiful.
translation.zh: 我只看过一部剧 非常好看

translation.en: It was called Cats.
translation.zh: 叫做《猫》

translation.en: Yeah, but that's a musical.
translation.zh: 是啊 但那是音乐剧

translation.en: It's not real theater.
translation.zh: 不是真正的戏剧

translation.en: But your play is?
translation.zh: 但你那部剧是的？

translation.en: Doesn't get much more classic.
translation.zh: 再经典不过了

translation.en: Tell me more.
translation.zh: 多跟我说说

translation.en: [Helen] Hey, girl.
translation.zh: 嘿 美女

translation.en: Hey, morning.
translation.zh: 早

translation.en: You know, Erik's at the Farmer's Market hunting strawberries for shortcake
translation.zh: 埃里克在农贸市场买草莓 准备做水果奶油蛋糕

translation.en: and you are way too early for croissants.
translation.zh: 你来吃羊角面包也太早了点

translation.en: I'm on my way to the office for a little quiet work time,
translation.zh: 我要去办公室安静地工作一会儿

translation.en: and I thought I'd pop in and say good morning.
translation.zh: 想着顺道过来说声早上好

translation.en: Well, good morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: You alone?
translation.zh: 就你一个人？

translation.en: Yeah, had to get a jump on things.
translation.zh: 是啊 我得早点开始

translation.en: Short-handed.
translation.zh: 人手不够

translation.en: I fired Brad.
translation.zh: 我炒了布拉德

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: 这样啊

translation.en: He was drinking.
translation.zh: 他喝酒了

translation.en: -You have a rule. -And he stole from me.
translation.zh: -你有规矩 -而且他偷我东西

translation.en: Oh, he broke the law.
translation.zh: 他犯法了

translation.en: And he lied to me.
translation.zh: 而且他骗我

translation.en: And I will not have a man who lies in this kitchen or in my life.
translation.zh: 我决不允许有男人骗我 无论在这厨房还是在我生活里

translation.en: You'll find better.
translation.zh: 你会找到更好的

translation.en: -[sighs] -For both.
translation.zh: 两方面都是

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: I hope so.
translation.zh: 希望如此

translation.en: Hello! -Mama. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -哈啰 -妈妈

translation.en: [chuckling] How crappy is your day, dear?
translation.zh: 今天过得有多糟糕 亲爱的？

translation.en: Well, that's such a kind assumption.
translation.zh: 你这样设想真是一片好心

translation.en: If your day was fabulous,
translation.zh: 要是你今天过得特别好

translation.en: your daughter would not have called me, begging me to rescue her.
translation.zh: 你女儿也不会打电话叫我来解救她了

translation.en: Katydid! Nana's here!
translation.zh: 小凯蒂 姥姥来了

translation.en: You know she's not supposed to use the phone without permission.
translation.zh: 你知道未经允许她不应该用电话的

translation.en: Well, just be grateful that she called me instead of someone less fun.
translation.zh: 她打电话给我这样有趣的人 你要心怀感激才对

translation.en: Oh, you're-- Good girl! You're doing your resume!
translation.zh: 真棒 你在弄简历

translation.en: But not very well. But you're doing it!
translation.zh: 但弄得不是很好 但毕竟在弄了

translation.en: Okay, well, don't help, Mama.
translation.zh: 好 别帮我 妈

translation.en: Mothers returning to the workforce
translation.zh: 回归职场的母亲

translation.en: should be thinking in terms of relevant experience.
translation.zh: 应该思考有那些相关经历

translation.en: For instance, um,
translation.zh: 比如说

translation.en: organizing school field trips is material and manpower management.
translation.zh: 组织学校郊游就是物料和人力管理

translation.en: When was the last time you did a resume?
translation.zh: 你上次做简历是什么时候？

translation.en: Never, I have a catalog. My paintings speak for me.
translation.zh: 从来没做过 我有作品集 我的画为我发声

translation.en: Well, then you should probably be the last person
translation.zh: 那最不应该给我简历建议的人

translation.en: giving me advice on writing one.
translation.zh: 大概就是你了

translation.en: Why does everyone think they can sit in judgment in my life?
translation.zh: 为什么大家都觉得 自己能随便对我的生活做评判？

translation.en: People are trying to help you because they love you,
translation.zh: 大家想帮你 是因为大家爱你

translation.en: and they believe that you deserve better.
translation.zh: 觉得你值得拥有更好的东西

translation.en: Me and my friends are ready to go, Nana!
translation.zh: 我和朋友们准备好出发了 姥姥

translation.en: Well, then let's go and have ourselves... [kisses] ...an adventure!
translation.zh: 那我们出发去冒险吧

translation.en: Oh, you know what you have to do before we go.
translation.zh: 你知道走之前需要做什么

translation.en: -Bye, Mommy. -Bye, baby.
translation.zh: -拜拜 妈妈 -拜拜 宝贝

translation.en: Have fun.
translation.zh: 玩得开心

translation.en: How bad can the world be, really?
translation.zh: 世界能有多糟糕 是吧？

translation.en: [Paula] So, are we gonna go get those black shoes today?
translation.zh: 我们今天要去拿那些黑鞋子吗？

translation.en: -[Katie] Yeah. -[Paula] You're very grown-up!
translation.zh: -是的 -你真的长大了

translation.en: So you have heard of the Pickle Jar?
translation.zh: 所以你听说过泡菜坛餐厅？

translation.en: I haven't been inside one.
translation.zh: 我没进过他们连锁店里

translation.en: But the commercials make it look like an arcade
translation.zh: 但广告上看起来像是

translation.en: crossed with a barn wrapped up in a burger joint.
translation.zh: 一个兼具游戏厅和谷仓风格的汉堡店

translation.en: -Yeah. -They're loud and messy,
translation.zh: -是啊 -那些店又吵又乱

translation.en: and they don't have ice cream!
translation.zh: 而且还没有冰淇淋

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Neville] They wanna buy the whole block.
translation.zh: 他们想买下整条街

translation.en: Us, the hardware store, and the dry cleaner.
translation.zh: 我们、五金店还有干洗店

translation.en: The Gibsons don't wanna sell.
translation.zh: 吉布森一家不想卖

translation.en: Collins, he'd sell the hardware store and leave town tomorrow.
translation.zh: 柯林斯愿意明天就卖掉五金店走人

translation.en: What do you want to do?
translation.zh: 你们想怎么做？

translation.en: Serenity does need the new business.
translation.zh: 宁静镇确实需要开展新业务

translation.en: Just not this one.
translation.zh: 但不能是这家

translation.en: It would be great to travel.
translation.zh: 出去旅游也不错

translation.en: You'd be bored in a week.
translation.zh: 你一周就会腻

translation.en: Do I sense a lack of consensus?
translation.zh: 看来还没达成一致？

translation.en: Mr. Worry Wart here is suddenly thinking
translation.zh: 这个莫名过分担忧的家伙突然觉得

translation.en: that maybe we should sell for the greater good.
translation.zh: 也许我们应该为了大众卖掉店面

translation.en: Go along with Collins,
translation.zh: 配合柯林斯

translation.en: persuade the Gibsons,
translation.zh: 说服吉布森一家

translation.en: and use the money to help Serenity in some new way.
translation.zh: 用这笔钱以新的方式来帮助宁静镇

translation.en: Which is why we wanted to see what you think of the offer.
translation.zh: 因此我们想知道你对这份报价的看法

translation.en: We do need to think of the greater good here.
translation.zh: 我们确实需要考虑到大众的利益

translation.en: You and I have always been committed to bringing business to Serenity, Helen.
translation.zh: 海伦 你我一直致力于 把新业务带入宁静镇

translation.en: Why else be on Town Council?
translation.zh: 不然为什么要参加镇议会工作？

translation.en: But as happy as Grace and I are here...
translation.zh: 虽然我和格蕾丝对这里很满意

translation.en: ...if you think this is a good offer and we--
translation.zh: 但如果你觉得报价不错 那我们…

translation.en: They're lowballing you. Significantly. They won't come up in any meaningful way.
translation.zh: 他们故意报低价 非常低 再怎么提升也没有意义

translation.en: Thank you, Jesus!
translation.zh: 谢谢你 老天爷！

translation.en: All right, sugar. We are not selling.
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝 我们不卖

translation.en: Helen says it's okay.
translation.zh: 海伦说这样没问题

translation.en: But what happens to Collins?
translation.zh: 但柯林斯怎么办？

translation.en: Well, we can work on finding him another option,
translation.zh: 我们可以帮他找其他的选择方案

translation.en: if he'll let us.
translation.zh: 如果他愿意的话

translation.en: Helen Decatur, I'm making you a milkshake to celebrate.
translation.zh: 海伦·迪凯特 我给你做份奶昔庆祝一下

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 棒

translation.en: [Annie] I've got dessert!
translation.zh: 我这里有甜点

translation.en: -Yay! Chef Erik brownies! -[Annie chuckles]
translation.zh: 耶！埃里克大厨布朗尼

translation.en: Mom knows they're your favorite.
translation.zh: 妈知道你最喜欢这个

translation.en: So, Margarita Night underway?
translation.zh: 今晚是“玛格丽塔之夜”？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, Aunt Helen came in with Mom and me.
translation.zh: 是的 海伦阿姨跟我和妈妈一起来的

translation.en: -They're in the living room. -As always.
translation.zh: -她们在客厅 -一如既往

translation.en: Uh, no, thanks. I gotta bounce. I'm meeting Luke.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 我得走了 我要去见卢克

translation.en: Should I put it in the fridge?
translation.zh: 要放冰箱吗？

translation.en: I'll take that!
translation.zh: 我来吃掉

translation.en: -Would you like to go-- -Trollhunters!
translation.zh: -你想不想看… -《巨怪猎人》

translation.en: Captain, you have the comm.
translation.zh: -船长 交给你了 -哇

translation.en: Wow, great power and great responsibility.
translation.zh: -船长 交给你了 -哇 权力大 责任也大

translation.en: I believe in you.
translation.zh: 我相信你

translation.en: All right, y'all. Don't have too much fun.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 别玩得太开心了

translation.en: [all] Pour it out.
translation.zh: 倾泻而出吧

translation.en: This touches my soul.
translation.zh: 触及灵魂

translation.en: The companions or the margaritas?
translation.zh: 我们的陪伴还是玛格丽塔？

translation.en: Mmm. Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I thank heavens for Margarita Nights.
translation.zh: 我喜欢玛格丽塔之夜

translation.en: I truly, truly believe
translation.zh: 我真心相信

translation.en: that there is not a problem in this world
translation.zh: 跟你们俩喝一杯酒、倾心交谈后

translation.en: that cannot be solved by having a drink and a talk
translation.zh: 这世上的任何问题

translation.en: with the two of you.
translation.zh: 都会迎刃而解

translation.en: It's been a week, hasn't it?
translation.zh: 这一周真累 是吧？

translation.en: Oof. Yeah, my week had a week.
translation.zh: 累到不能更累

translation.en: [Helen] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Right. I fired Brad.
translation.zh: 对 我炒了布拉德

translation.en: So I have to find a new sous-chef and...
translation.zh: 所以我得找到新的副主厨 还有…

translation.en: ugh, just regular kitchen turmoil.
translation.zh: 就是通常的厨房混乱事

translation.en: Oh, and also my daughter hates me and hates Serenity
translation.zh: 还有 我女儿讨厌我 还讨厌宁静镇

translation.en: and can't wait to get away from both of us, so--
translation.zh: 迫不及待想离开我、离开镇子 所以…

translation.en: What happened with Annie?
translation.zh: 安妮怎么了？

translation.en: She is going through that very special phase.
translation.zh: 她正在经历那个非常阶段

translation.en: Serenity is small and slow and she must see the world.
translation.zh: 宁静镇太小太沉闷 她必须去看世界

translation.en: Oh, I remember that phase.
translation.zh: 我记得那个阶段

translation.en: Yeah. You do, and you did it. You left. Cheers.
translation.zh: 是啊 而且你真的离开了 干杯

translation.en: Yes, cheers. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: All right, well, this is what Annie thinks of Serenity.
translation.zh: 好吧 这就是安妮眼中的宁静镇

translation.en: [Helen] Whatever happened to expressing yourself through bad haircuts and loud music?
translation.zh: 怎么不用糟糕发型和吵闹音乐 来表达自己了？

translation.en: -[Dana Sue] Thank you. -[Maddie] These are good.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 -这些真棒

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Not the possum. -[Helen] That's a possum!
translation.zh: -不是说负鼠 -那是只负鼠

translation.en: -But the pictures. -[Helen] Uh-uh. She should keep this up.
translation.zh: 但我说的是照片很棒 她该保持下去

translation.en: Well, this isn't really how I want her to see Serenity.
translation.zh: 好吧 我不想她这样看待宁静镇

translation.en: You can encourage her art while also continuing to change her point of view.
translation.zh: 你可以在鼓励她做艺术的同时 继续改变她的观点

translation.en: [Dana Sue] But the art, right?
translation.zh: 但得是艺术吧？

translation.en: [Maddie] I'm sorry, Dana Sue.
translation.zh: 抱歉 达娜·苏

translation.en: And I'm sorry about Brad.
translation.zh: 布拉德的事 我也很遗憾

translation.en: Is that why you're carrying that weight of the world look on your face?
translation.zh: 你就是因为这事 才一副忧心忡忡的样子吗？

translation.en: You mean this?
translation.zh: 你是说这个样子？

translation.en: It's all the rage this season, you know? [laughs]
translation.zh: 这一季最流行这个了

translation.en: And it goes perfectly
translation.zh: 而且完美搭配

translation.en: with my "Are you sure you want my opinion?" lipstick.
translation.zh: 我那只“你确定想听我意见”口红

translation.en: Mmm. I highly recommend the "Don't make me smack you" nail polish.
translation.zh: 我极力推荐“别逼我削你”指甲油

translation.en: [Maddie] Favorite shade.
translation.zh: 最喜欢的色调

translation.en: You know, all this beauty talk sure makes me wish
translation.zh: 谈了这么多的美妆

translation.en: we were going somewhere soothing and relaxing,
translation.zh: 我真希望 我们能去一个舒缓放松的地方

translation.en: like a spa.
translation.zh: 比如水疗会所

translation.en: Mmm. Oh my, yes. I would do anything to go to one.
translation.zh: 是啊 只要能去 我什么都愿意付出

translation.en: -Me too. -Or better yet, to run one!
translation.zh: -我也是 -或者更好的是自己开一家

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 打住

translation.en: I know you guys mean well, but my life is insane.
translation.zh: 我知道你们是好意 但我的生活很疯狂

translation.en: I'm holding it together by duct tape and happy thoughts
translation.zh: 我是靠胶带和开心的想法 来维持生活的完整性

translation.en: and I'm near out of both.
translation.zh: 但两者都快耗光了

translation.en: Which makes this the perfect time to start something new.
translation.zh: 所以现在是开始新事物的完美时间

translation.en: I mean, I don't know if it's going to restock your duct tape,
translation.zh: 虽然不知道能不能补充你的胶带库存

translation.en: but...
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: -those happy thoughts will just-- -[Maddie] What about you?
translation.zh: -那些开心的想法会… -那你呢？

translation.en: You're swamped at the restaurant. You think you can take this on too?
translation.zh: 餐厅的事已经让你忙不过来 你觉得自己还能开店？

translation.en: You know me. The busier I am, the happier I am.
translation.zh: 你了解我的 我越忙碌就越开心

translation.en: Maddie, you are a terrific manager.
translation.zh: 麦迪 你是个非常棒的经理

translation.en: And you have a gift for marketing.
translation.zh: 而且你有营销天赋

translation.en: You remember what that boutique in Charleston looked like
translation.zh: 记得查尔斯顿那家精品店

translation.en: -before you started? -Barely.
translation.zh: -在你去之前的样子吗？ -不记得

translation.en: That was before the kids.
translation.zh: 那是孩子出生前的事了

translation.en: That was how you put Bill through medical school.
translation.zh: 你当时靠那份工作 支撑比尔读完了医学院

translation.en: Another lifetime.
translation.zh: 感觉像是上辈子

translation.en: And another lifetime starts right now.
translation.zh: 下辈子立马就开始了

translation.en: With you in the driver's seat, -pedal to the metal... -[Helen] Yes.
translation.zh: 你坐在驾驶座上 踩满油门

translation.en: ...not answering to a man.
translation.zh: 不听男人的使唤

translation.en: ♪ It's yo' money, yo' destiny ♪
translation.zh: 那是你的钱 你的命运…

translation.en: Wait, so this is charity?
translation.zh: 等等 所以你们这是做慈善？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Maddie, it's an investment.
translation.zh: 麦迪 这是做投资

translation.en: Maddie, Maddie, we have been talking about this
translation.zh: 麦迪 我们还在凯蒂这年纪时

translation.en: since we were Katie's age!
translation.zh: 就一直在说这事了

translation.en: Going into business together, remember?
translation.zh: 一起开店做生意 记得吗？

translation.en: The Sweet Magnolias making their mark on Serenity.
translation.zh: 甜木兰组合要在宁静镇立名

translation.en: Our, our spa is the perfect way to do that.
translation.zh: 我们的水疗会所 就是达成目标的完美之道

translation.en: -Come on, Maddie. You gotta trust us. -[Maddie] Okay.
translation.zh: 拜托 麦迪 你得信任我们

translation.en: When have we ever led you astray?
translation.zh: 我们何曾让你走上歧途？

translation.en: Don't answer that.
translation.zh: 别回答我

translation.en: [laughing] I'm not. I can't. I cannot answer that.
translation.zh: 我不回答 我答不上来

translation.en: That's not the way to convince her! Don't lie to her!
translation.zh: 这样可说服不了她 别骗她

translation.en: I take it back.
translation.zh: 我把话收回

translation.en: Then what is it that binds us together as a congregation?
translation.zh: 是什么把我们团结成为一群会众？

translation.en: As a community?
translation.zh: 成为一个社区？

translation.en: Is it habit? Obligation?
translation.zh: 是习惯？是义务？

translation.en: Or is it a shared vision of the future
translation.zh: 还是因为简单有力的 让大家互爱的诫命

translation.en: informed by the simple, eloquent commandment to love one another?
translation.zh: 给了大家一份对于未来的共同愿景？

translation.en: If we can trust that sharing,
translation.zh: 如果我们能信任这份分享

translation.en: that commitment,
translation.zh: 这份承诺

translation.en: then we can go forward and do great things for each other
translation.zh: 那我们就能为彼此做出伟大的事

translation.en: and for the Lord.
translation.zh: 为上帝做出伟大的事

translation.en: The kingdom doesn't have to advance with brass bands or bulldozers.
translation.zh: 王国无需带着铜管乐队或推土机前进

translation.en: No, it can advance gently,
translation.zh: 不 它可以温和地前进

translation.en: with love, with respect, and with grace.
translation.zh: 带着爱、带着尊重、带着恩惠

translation.en: -Amen? -[congregation] Amen.
translation.zh: -阿门？ -阿门

translation.en: And now it is my pleasure
translation.zh: 现在很高兴请出

translation.en: to invite Joyful Noise to come forward.
translation.zh: 愉悦噪音唱诗班上台来

translation.en: ♪ I'm walking with Jesus ♪
translation.zh: 我与耶稣漫步

translation.en: ♪ The way that he teaches... ♪
translation.zh: 耶稣的教导之道…

translation.en: Glad you could come hear Katie sing, Bill.
translation.zh: 很高兴你能来听凯蒂唱诗 比尔

translation.en: -She did a great job. -Oh, didn't she, though?
translation.zh: 她表现很棒 是吗？

translation.en: Welcome to Prince of Peace. I'm Pastor June Wilkes.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到和平王子教堂 我是茱恩·威克斯牧师

translation.en: -Noreen Fitzgibbons. -Oh.
translation.zh: 诺琳·菲茨吉本斯

translation.en: Bill's fiancée.
translation.zh: 比尔的未婚妻

translation.en: Your church is beautiful.
translation.zh: 你们教堂真漂亮

translation.en: Thank you very much. Well, good to see you, Bill.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 很高兴见到你 比尔

translation.en: -Thank you. -See you next time?
translation.zh: -谢谢 -下次再见？

translation.en: You bet. Of course. Thank you, Pastor.
translation.zh: 肯定的 谢谢你 牧师

translation.en: People are staring more than usual this week.
translation.zh: 这周我好像招来了更多目光

translation.en: Is my dress hiked up in the back?
translation.zh: 是后面的裙子走形了吗？

translation.en: It isn't your dress. It's your ex.
translation.zh: 不是裙子的问题 是前夫的问题

translation.en: Everyone's just waiting for you to melt down
translation.zh: 大家都在等着你情绪崩溃

translation.en: 'cause Bill and the nurse are here.
translation.zh: 因为比尔和那护士在这里

translation.en: Well, precisely why I won't.
translation.zh: 正因如此 我才不要崩溃

translation.en: Well, heck, if you're not gonna make a scene,
translation.zh: 见鬼 如果你不会大闹一场

translation.en: then why am I standing here? I have gotta go to work.
translation.zh: 那我来这里做什么？我得去工作了

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -All right, where did Annie get to? -Mmm.
translation.zh: 好了 安妮去哪里了？

translation.en: She's had a visit.
translation.zh: 有人找她

translation.en: I'll bring her back. We'll catch a movie or something.
translation.zh: 我会带她回去 我们一起看个电影什么的

translation.en: Thank you. You are a very thoughtful godmother.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你真是个考虑周到的教母

translation.en: Yeah. You should see what I can do with a pumpkin and a couple of mice.
translation.zh: 你该看看我能把南瓜和老鼠变成什么

translation.en: I'd like to see that.
translation.zh: 我很想看看

translation.en: It really is pretty.
translation.zh: 真的很漂亮

translation.en: I wish we could get married here.
translation.zh: 要是能在这里结婚就好了

translation.en: We'll get married somewhere beautiful, all right?
translation.zh: 我们会在漂亮的地方结婚的 好吗？

translation.en: Just not here. It wouldn't be--
translation.zh: 只是不在这里 那样做…

translation.en: Appropriate. I know.
translation.zh: 不合适 我知道

translation.en: Hey, why don't you get yourself something to eat, okay?
translation.zh: 你去找点东西吃吧 好吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna go have a chat with Tyler right quick.
translation.zh: 我去跟泰勒很快地谈几句

translation.en: Lemonade?
translation.zh: 要柠檬水吗？

translation.en: I assume you're not drinking coffee these days.
translation.zh: 我想你最近没喝咖啡吧

translation.en: Thank you so much, Peggy.
translation.zh: 真谢谢你 佩吉

translation.en: It must be hard, what you're going through.
translation.zh: 你现在的经历肯定很难熬

translation.en: Especially without your family.
translation.zh: 特别是家人不在身边

translation.en: You're in my prayers.
translation.zh: 我为你祈祷

translation.en: Well, you need a pitching coach.
translation.zh: 你需要一个投球教练

translation.en: -I mean, your fastball should be-- -I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你的快球应该要… -我不用

translation.en: Look, Coach Maddox may have played for the Braves,
translation.zh: 虽然马多克斯教练在勇士队打过

translation.en: but he was a shortstop, not a pitcher.
translation.zh: 但他是游击手 不是投手

translation.en: And this is his first year coaching high school.
translation.zh: 而且这是他第一年教中学

translation.en: -You're a guinea pig. -I'm fine.
translation.zh: -你们是小白鼠 -我没事

translation.en: -Look, a fraternity brother of mine-- -Dad, I'm fine!
translation.zh: -我有个兄弟会的兄弟… -爸 我没事

translation.en: Okay, just back off!
translation.zh: 别来烦我

translation.en: Hey, you watch your tone, son.
translation.zh: 注意语气 儿子

translation.en: I'm your father, and this is church.
translation.zh: 我是你父亲 这里是教堂

translation.en: Tyler.
translation.zh: 泰勒

translation.en: It's the day of rest. Can we give it one, please?
translation.zh: 今天是休息日 能息战吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm trying to have a conversation with my son, okay?
translation.zh: 我只是想跟儿子说说话 好吧？

translation.en: What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 你想让我怎样？

translation.en: Right here? Right now?
translation.zh: 此地？此刻？

translation.en: I want whatever... Everything that went wrong between us
translation.zh: 我想让…我们之间的所有不快

translation.en: just to stay between us.
translation.zh: 都只限于我们俩

translation.en: I miss the kids, Maddie.
translation.zh: 我想念孩子们了 麦迪

translation.en: I'm sure you do.
translation.zh: 肯定是的

translation.en: You just need to give them some time.
translation.zh: 你要给他们一点时间

translation.en: And it wouldn't hurt to show them a little understanding.
translation.zh: 而且对他们表示一点理解也无妨

translation.en: Well, it wouldn't hurt if they showed me a little respect.
translation.zh: 好吧 他们对我表示一点尊重也无妨

translation.en: My daddy taught me that respect is earned.
translation.zh: 我爸教导我说 尊重是赢来的

translation.en: Maybe your daddy told you the same
translation.zh: 也许你爸也同样教导过你

translation.en: while he was busy teaching you that you're always right.
translation.zh: 只是同时他还在忙着教导你说 你总是对的

translation.en: Is that how you're talking about me with them?
translation.zh: 你对孩子们就是这样说我的？

translation.en: I try my best to not talk about you.
translation.zh: 我尽力不提到你

translation.en: -Hey, Noreen! -Hey!
translation.zh: -嘿 诺琳 -嘿

translation.en: Can you eat cookies?
translation.zh: 你能吃饼干吗？

translation.en: With the baby and all?
translation.zh: 你现在怀孕 能吃吗？

translation.en: I watch what I eat, but I love a good chocolate chip cookie.
translation.zh: 我注意自己的食物 但我也喜欢美味的碎巧克力饼干

translation.en: -Here. -Oh, thanks.
translation.zh: -给 -谢谢

translation.en: I, um... I looked up that play you're in.
translation.zh: 我查了查你参演的那部剧

translation.en: -Yeah? -You didn't tell me it was so sad.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -你没跟我说剧情那么悲伤

translation.en: It's not. It's a comedy.
translation.zh: 不是的 那是喜剧

translation.en: But... everybody's with the wrong person.
translation.zh: 可是…人人身边都是错的人

translation.en: Yeah, but they get it right in the end.
translation.zh: 嗯 但最后都是对的人了

translation.en: And I help.
translation.zh: 我有所帮助

translation.en: I mean, I guess I kinda start the whole mess in the first place,
translation.zh: 我是说 一开始算是我搅起整个混乱

translation.en: but then I go and, uh...
translation.zh: 但之后我…

translation.en: You should see it.
translation.zh: 你该看看这部剧

translation.en: I'd like that.
translation.zh: 我很乐意

translation.en: Bill.
translation.zh: 比尔

translation.en: Oh, not now, Helen! All right?
translation.zh: 别挑现在 海伦 好吧？

translation.en: Brace yourself.
translation.zh: 你做好准备

translation.en: I want to help you.
translation.zh: 我想帮你

translation.en: So Brad's not coming back?
translation.zh: 布拉德不回来了吗？

translation.en: Nope, Isaac, he is not.
translation.zh: 不 艾萨克 他不回来

translation.en: When's my interview?
translation.zh: 何时面试我？

translation.en: I appreciate that. Truly I do,
translation.zh: 我很感谢你这样说 真的

translation.en: but you're fresh outta culinary school.
translation.zh: 但你刚从烹饪学校毕业

translation.en: You don't have the experience on the line to be second in command,
translation.zh: 你没有做副手的经验

translation.en: plus God gifted you to make desserts.
translation.zh: 而且上帝给了你做甜点的天赋

translation.en: I can do both.
translation.zh: 我二者都能做

translation.en: [Dana Sue chuckles] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No, you would wear yourself to a nub, and I couldn't bear the guilt.
translation.zh: 不 你会把自己弄得精疲力尽 我承受不了那份负罪感

translation.en: Appreciate you, but I will figure this out.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 但我会解决这问题的

translation.en: -Are you gonna dance with me forever? -Yep.
translation.zh: -你要永远跟我跳舞吗？ -要

translation.en: Do you wanna twirl me?
translation.zh: 想让我旋转吗？

translation.en: -[Katie] I'll get it! -Okay.
translation.zh: -我去开门 -好的

translation.en: Daddy!
translation.zh: 爸

translation.en: Hey there, kiddo.
translation.zh: 嘿 小家伙

translation.en: -[Katie] Daddy's here! -I see that, sweetheart.
translation.zh: -爸爸来了 -我看到了 宝贝

translation.en: Daddy, Mommy's making chicken parm. You should stay.
translation.zh: 爸 妈妈在做帕玛森芝士鸡肉 你该留下来

translation.en: Well, that is sweet of you, ladybug!
translation.zh: 你真贴心 小瓢虫

translation.en: But tonight, I can't.
translation.zh: 但今晚不行

translation.en: Another day, though.
translation.zh: 改天吧

translation.en: I promise.
translation.zh: 我保证

translation.en: Right now I just need to talk to your mom right quick,
translation.zh: 现在我只是要跟你妈妈很快聊几句

translation.en: so why don't you run on upstairs and play, okay?
translation.zh: 你上楼玩吧 好吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I know, I should've called first.
translation.zh: 我知道 我应该先打个电话的

translation.en: -Is this about what happened after church? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是因为教堂做完礼拜后的事吗？ -是的

translation.en: It is, but not about our conversation.
translation.zh: 是的 但与我们的对话无关

translation.en: After you left...
translation.zh: 你走之后

translation.en: I talked to Helen.
translation.zh: 我跟海伦谈了谈

translation.en: Look, I want to do the right thing here, Maddie.
translation.zh: 听着 我想做正确的事 麦迪

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: you and the kids should keep the house.
translation.zh: 这房子应该归属你和孩子们

translation.en: And we'll make it work, okay?
translation.zh: 我们会成功解决问题的 好吗？

translation.en: I'm sure that parm's gonna be terrific.
translation.zh: 这道帕玛森芝士鸡肉一定会很棒

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Aunt Helen, why'd you come back?
translation.zh: 海伦阿姨 你为什么要回来？

translation.en: San Francisco.
translation.zh: 旧金山

translation.en: Why'd you come back here to Serenity?
translation.zh: 你为什么要回到宁静镇？

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么这么问？

translation.en: I've just been thinking, you know, you got out.
translation.zh: 我只是一直在想 你离开过

translation.en: You traveled, had adventures, you ran away with a boy--
translation.zh: 旅游、冒险、跟男孩一起跑掉…

translation.en: I did not run away with Ryan Wingate. Who told you that?
translation.zh: 我没有跟莱恩·温格特一起跑掉 这是谁告诉你的？

translation.en: We got back together in college,
translation.zh: 我们上大学时重修旧好

translation.en: and then we made a careful plan
translation.zh: 然后我们做了一份周密的计划

translation.en: to go to San Francisco after I finished law school.
translation.zh: 等我读完法学院就去旧金山

translation.en: There was no running away.
translation.zh: 那可不是跑掉

translation.en: So what happened?
translation.zh: 后来呢？

translation.en: [sighs] The careful plan unraveled.
translation.zh: 那个周密的计划散架了

translation.en: We broke up.
translation.zh: 我们分手了

translation.en: But you're brilliant and amazing. You could've gone anywhere.
translation.zh: 但你很聪明、很了不起 去哪里都可以

translation.en: Why'd you come back here?
translation.zh: 为什么要回到这里？

translation.en: Well, my mother was sick,
translation.zh: 当时我母亲生病

translation.en: and my father was already gone,
translation.zh: 我父亲早已去世

translation.en: so I needed to be here with her.
translation.zh: 所以我需要在这里陪她

translation.en: And you stayed?
translation.zh: 然后你留了下来？

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Because in the darkest moments of my life, this town stood with me.
translation.zh: 因为在我人生最黑暗的时刻 这个镇子支持了我

translation.en: Through losing my father,
translation.zh: 在我失去父亲

translation.en: fighting with the mill, and my mother's illness.
translation.zh: 跟磨坊作斗争、跟母亲的病作斗争时

translation.en: People like Ms. Grace and Mr. Neville and Ms. Frances,
translation.zh: 格蕾丝小姐、纳威先生 弗朗西丝女士等人

translation.en: they-- they held me up.
translation.zh: 他们帮助了我

translation.en: But most of all, your mother and Maddie.
translation.zh: 特别是你妈妈和麦迪

translation.en: They loved me.
translation.zh: 她们爱我

translation.en: They saved me.
translation.zh: 她们救了我

translation.en: How could I leave them?
translation.zh: 我怎么能离开她们？

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: We have laughed, we have cried,
translation.zh: 我们笑也笑过 哭也哭过

translation.en: we have eaten popcorn.
translation.zh: 爆米花也吃过了

translation.en: Meanwhile, y'all look like you've played eight quarters of football around here.
translation.zh: 与其同时 你们这里都像打完橄榄球比赛似的

translation.en: How's life sans Brad?
translation.zh: 没有布拉德的日子如何？

translation.en: Hectic.
translation.zh: 忙到爆

translation.en: I should get ready for my shift.
translation.zh: 我该去准备上班了

translation.en: -Thank you, Aunt Helen. -Anytime.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 海伦阿姨 -不客气

translation.en: No offense, but you're not going to survive
translation.zh: 恕我直言 没有副手

translation.en: without a second in command.
translation.zh: 你是撑不下去的

translation.en: I will find someone. Don't start worrying about me.
translation.zh: 我会找到人的 不要开始担心我

translation.en: I will stop pushing,
translation.zh: 我不会再逼你

translation.en: but I will not stop worrying.
translation.zh: 但我不会停止担心你

translation.en: It is how I express my love.
translation.zh: 这是我表达爱的方式

translation.en: Besides, how am I supposed to look June Wilkes in the eye on Sunday
translation.zh: 再说 要是今天不支持有需要的姐妹

translation.en: if I do not stand with a sister in need today?
translation.zh: 周日我怎么能直视 茱恩·威克斯的眼睛？

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
translation.zh: -阿门 -阿门

translation.en: Erik, what is that?
translation.zh: 埃里克 这是什么？

translation.en: It's Brad's infamous pot pie.
translation.zh: 布拉德臭名昭著的菜肉馅饼

translation.en: No, it's not. The crust--
translation.zh: 不是的 酥皮…

translation.en: But the crust was made by a pastry chef so, of course, it's better.
translation.zh: 酥皮由面点大厨制作 所以当然更好

translation.en: Plus, I added a touch of sugar for sweetness
translation.zh: 另外我加了点糖 增加甜味

translation.en: to contrast with the savoriness of the filling.
translation.zh: 用以反衬馅料的咸味

translation.en: I changed up some of the spices in the gravy too.
translation.zh: 我还调整了肉汁的一些香料

translation.en: That's the cardamom talking.
translation.zh: 那是小豆蔻的味道

translation.en: Mmm. What other talents are you hiding, Mr. Whitley?
translation.zh: 你还藏着什么天赋 惠特利先生？

translation.en: What else would you like to see?
translation.zh: 你还想看到什么？

translation.en: Wanna put this on the dinner menu Tuesday night?
translation.zh: 想把这道菜放入周二晚餐菜单吗？

translation.en: It would be an honor, chef.
translation.zh: 这是我的荣幸 主厨

translation.en: All right. I still want those brownies out.
translation.zh: 好了 那些布朗尼还是得出炉

translation.en: -They're coming. They're coming. -All right. Get busy.
translation.zh: -就快了 -好 忙碌起来

translation.en: Get back inside!
translation.zh: 回屋里去

translation.en: [Neville] You want Pickle Jar to come in here and take over a business
translation.zh: 你想让泡菜坛餐厅来这里取代一家

translation.en: -that's been here for over 80 years. -[Mary] Wait, hold on!
translation.zh: -80年的老店 -等等

translation.en: [Neville] Ah, Helen!
translation.zh: 海伦

translation.en: Mary Vaughn has invited us to a meeting.
translation.zh: 玛丽·沃恩邀请我们去参加会议

translation.en: Would you like to come along?
translation.zh: 你想一起来吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: This meeting is just for the Whartons, the Gibsons, and Collins Littlefield.
translation.zh: 本次会议只针对沃顿家人 吉布森家人和柯林斯·利特菲德

translation.en: Ah. The Pickle Jar sales stakeholders!
translation.zh: 泡菜坛收购案的利益相关者

translation.en: And are you holding this meeting
translation.zh: 你主持这次会议的身份

translation.en: in your role as our mayor's wife or in your role as the realtor
translation.zh: 是市长妻子还是能从此次收购中

translation.en: with the greatest financial interest in these sales going through?
translation.zh: 获利最大的房产经纪人？

translation.en: As an interested citizen.
translation.zh: 是热心公民

translation.en: [Helen] Oh! Well, then, this should be a public meeting.
translation.zh: 那好 这应该是一次公开会议

translation.en: And, Peggy, I hope that for the benefit of an informed populace,
translation.zh: 还有 佩吉 出于大众知情的考虑

translation.en: you will cover this public meeting
translation.zh: 希望你以报纸副总编的身份

translation.en: in your role as a deputy editor of our paper
translation.zh: 报道这次公开会议

translation.en: and not in the role of Mary Vaughn's best friend.
translation.zh: 而不是作为玛丽·沃恩的闺蜜

translation.en: I've put this town first my entire life, Helen.
translation.zh: 我这辈子一直都以小镇优先 海伦

translation.en: Can you say the same?
translation.zh: 你也是吗？

translation.en: Always a pleasure, Mr. Neville, Ms. Grace.
translation.zh: 见到你们总是很愉快 纳威先生 格蕾丝女士

translation.en: Bless your heart.
translation.zh: 衷心祝福你

translation.en: Breathe, Ty.
translation.zh: 呼吸 阿泰

translation.en: Good effort, Ty! Go get your gear. We're done for today.
translation.zh: 很不错 阿泰 去拿你的装备 今天到此为止

translation.en: Hey, don't go soft, Harlan.
translation.zh: 别放水 哈伦

translation.en: You can't let him get away with throwing junk. The kid's got a gift.
translation.zh: 他投球这么烂 不能放过他 那孩子有天赋

translation.en: And the kid's world is blowing up.
translation.zh: 这孩子的世界天翻地覆

translation.en: We can cut him some slack and still get him into the Hall of Fame.
translation.zh: 让他喘口气 他依然能进入名人堂

translation.en: -Hold on. What're you talking about? -Cal,
translation.zh: -等等 你在说什么？ -卡尔

translation.en: I know you're the new kid in town, but really? Ty's dad?
translation.zh: 我知道你是镇上新来的 但你真不知道？阿泰他爸爸？

translation.en: Is a doctor and a big donor, so?
translation.zh: 是个医生和大额捐款人 怎么了？

translation.en: So, Dr. Bill had an affair with his nurse.
translation.zh: 比尔医生跟他的护士有染

translation.en: A girl closer to Ty's age than his own.
translation.zh: 那姑娘年纪跟阿泰更接近

translation.en: Knocked her up and left his family to...
translation.zh: 把人肚子搞大了 抛弃了家人

translation.en: do the right thing by the nurse.
translation.zh: 免得辜负那个护士

translation.en: Boy has every right to be off his game.
translation.zh: 这孩子心不在焉也情有可原

translation.en: How the heck did I miss that?
translation.zh: 我居然会不知道这事？

translation.en: You need to do some more catching drills, Coach.
translation.zh: 你得多练练接球 教练

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Maddie] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: How was practice?
translation.zh: 练习如何？

translation.en: Ty?
translation.zh: 阿泰？

translation.en: I suck, Mom.
translation.zh: 我很烂 妈

translation.en: I should just quit.
translation.zh: 我应该退出

translation.en: You're not gonna quit.
translation.zh: 不能退出

translation.en: I know what people think every time I step on that mound, okay?
translation.zh: 我知道我每次上场 大家都在想什么

translation.en: Yeah, so do I.
translation.zh: 对 我也是

translation.en: That you're a fine young man, and you are a superb pitcher.
translation.zh: 大家都觉得你是个优秀小伙子 是个超厉害的投手

translation.en: Yeah, I wish.
translation.zh: 这样想才怪

translation.en: Ty...
translation.zh: 阿泰

translation.en: you don't carry anyone's sins but your own.
translation.zh: 别人的罪过不需要你来担

translation.en: Focus on the fact that you have a gift.
translation.zh: 只要想着你有天赋

translation.en: And you're gonna be thankful for that gift.
translation.zh: 你会感谢这份天赋

translation.en: And you are gonna develop it
translation.zh: 你要发展这份天赋

translation.en: and you are gonna listen to the coaches that help you do just that.
translation.zh: 听教练的话 帮助你来发展天赋

translation.en: Look, I know it's hard.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道现在很难熬

translation.en: It's hard, and it's unfair, and it's lousy,
translation.zh: 很难熬 很不公平 很糟糕

translation.en: and Lord knows I would change everything for you if I could.
translation.zh: 天知道我有多想为你改变这一切

translation.en: But we're gonna find our way forward.
translation.zh: 但我们会找到前进之道的

translation.en: Together.
translation.zh: 我们一起

translation.en: Because I'm always here for you.
translation.zh: 因为我永远都会支持你

translation.en: And I believe in you.
translation.zh: 而且我相信你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Yes. Thank you.
translation.zh: 太棒了 谢谢你

translation.en: -Good game! -Oh, yeah. As usual.
translation.zh: -打得好 跟以往一样 -是啊

translation.en: -What's that bring my debt to? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我欠你多少了？

translation.en: Five figures?
translation.zh: 五位数了吧？

translation.en: Or a recommendation of a good fertility specialist.
translation.zh: 要不给我推荐一位 优秀的生育科专家吧

translation.en: -For you? You still have-- -No, please.
translation.zh: -给你？你还有… -别说出来

translation.en: Don't say that I have time.
translation.zh: 别说我还有时间

translation.en: As a certain birthday looms,
translation.zh: 我也快到某个年纪了

translation.en: it sounds a little pitying.
translation.zh: 这话听着有几分自怜的味道

translation.en: Okay, but asking as your old...
translation.zh: 好吧 但作为你的老…

translation.en: make that longtime friend, not your doctor,
translation.zh: 你的故交 而不是作为你的医生

translation.en: something happen?
translation.zh: 我要问问是什么情况

translation.en: You're sweet. No, no.
translation.zh: 你人真好 没什么情况

translation.en: This isn't caused by an affair or the lack of one.
translation.zh: 不是因为我有了情人或者找不到情人

translation.en: I'm just... examining my options.
translation.zh: 我只是…在看看自己有何选择

translation.en: I could recommend a friend from medical school.
translation.zh: 我可以推荐一位医学院的朋友

translation.en: She's in Charleston.
translation.zh: 她在查尔斯顿

translation.en: But she's a straight-talking woman. Strong opinions.
translation.zh: 但她是个心直口快的人 观念很强势

translation.en: I don't know that you two would get along.
translation.zh: 不知道你们俩合不合得来

translation.en: Mama?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: Oh, my goodness! A surprise visit!
translation.zh: 我的天 突然来看我

translation.en: Ooh! And an unsolicited kiss. What happened?
translation.zh: 而且主动亲我 发生什么事了？

translation.en: I made a mistake.
translation.zh: 我犯了个错

translation.en: Well, you didn't make me a grandma before 40
translation.zh: 你没在40岁之前让我做姥姥

translation.en: and in this town, that's saying something.
translation.zh: 在这镇上 这点就很了不起了

translation.en: So how bad could your mistake be?
translation.zh: 你犯的错能有多严重？

translation.en: Well, I had a moment today where I realized
translation.zh: 今天有一刻我突然意识到

translation.en: that a child does not always understand
translation.zh: 孩子不总是能明白

translation.en: when their parent is trying to take care of them.
translation.zh: 家长是想照顾好他们

translation.en: So I wanted to apologize to you
translation.zh: 所以我想向你道歉

translation.en: for snapping at you Saturday about...
translation.zh: 周六我无缘无故…

translation.en: well, everything.
translation.zh: 冲你发脾气

translation.en: You could've called.
translation.zh: 你打个电话就行了

translation.en: Oh please, darlin'. I was raised better than that.
translation.zh: 拜托 亲爱的 我的家教没那么烂

translation.en: Oh, sweet girl.
translation.zh: 好姑娘

translation.en: I am so sorry
translation.zh: 我真的很遗憾

translation.en: that life is kicking you in the fanny so hard right now.
translation.zh: 生活现在如此让你难熬

translation.en: [sighs] What you need is a lavender bath and a glass of Merlot.
translation.zh: 你需要的就是泡个薰衣草澡 再喝杯梅洛红酒

translation.en: Oh, as lovely as that sounds, I can't. I gotta get going.
translation.zh: 虽然听起来很棒 但我不行 我得走了

translation.en: No, Maddie. If you don't start taking care of yourself,
translation.zh: 不 麦迪 如果你不开始照顾好自己

translation.en: who's gonna take care of your children?
translation.zh: 谁来照顾好你的孩子？

translation.en: Your friends?
translation.zh: 照顾你的朋友？

translation.en: And all the people counting on you?
translation.zh: 照顾那些依赖你的人？

translation.en: Mama, you sound like Helen and Dana Sue.
translation.zh: 妈 你说话就跟海伦和达娜·苏一样

translation.en: What're you going on about?
translation.zh: 你说什么呢？

translation.en: Oh, they... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 她们…

translation.en: They have this crazy idea about opening a spa
translation.zh: 她们有个疯狂的想法 要开个水疗会所

translation.en: and having me run it, and I just...
translation.zh: 让我来经营 我只是…

translation.en: They keep telling me how wonderful it'll be,
translation.zh: 她们一直跟我说那样有多棒

translation.en: but honestly, it...
translation.zh: 但说实话

translation.en: it sounds overwhelming. And terrifying.
translation.zh: 这事听起来压力很大 而且很吓人

translation.en: I thought you were done
translation.zh: 我以前你已经受够了

translation.en: with other people planning your life for you.
translation.zh: 让其他人来规划你的人生

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Now, if you want to do it, do it.
translation.zh: 如果你想做 那就去做

translation.en: Now if you think it's a crazy idea, tell them.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得这主意很疯狂 那就告诉她们

translation.en: Those girls love you. They'll respect your decision.
translation.zh: 那俩姑娘爱你 会尊重你的决定

translation.en: You chart... your own path.
translation.zh: 你的路由你来定

translation.en: -All right? -Okay.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -好

translation.en: -Okay. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I love you so much. I love you too.
translation.zh: -我很爱你 -我也爱你

translation.en: I am so happy that Maddie came around.
translation.zh: 麦迪想通了 我真开心

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but she's gonna say no.
translation.zh: 虽然我不想告诉你坏消息 但她会拒绝我们

translation.en: She's overwhelmed, and I can't say that I blame her.
translation.zh: 她现在压力太大 我也不能怪她

translation.en: So why would she wanna meet us here?
translation.zh: 那她为什么想在这里跟我们见面？

translation.en: This is where the dream started. What better place to say farewell?
translation.zh: 这里是梦想开始的地方 还有哪里更适合道别？
